'''Diona''' is a playable {{Cryo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Despite being a bartender at the [[Cat's Tail]], she loathes alcohol and will stop at nothing to ruin [[Mondstadt]]'s wine industry &mdash; a feat easier said than done when her patrons absolutely love her drinks. She is the daughter of [[Draff]], a hunter in [[Springvale]].
